short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wizard AI is an AI helper for your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WizardAI is a privacy focused Chrome extension that brings AI assistance directly into your browser using Google's Gemini AI models.

* Select any text on a webpage, right-click, and choose "WizardAI" to get AI assistance
* Clean, dark-themed interface that overlays on your current webpage
* Real-time streaming responses with markdown support
* Your messages or API keys never leave your browser  

This extension is perfect for students, researchers, developers, or anyone who frequently needs AI assistance while browsing the web.
